info.name: Tanares Dwarf
info.description: Optional Dwarf Trait from Tanares RPG 5e
info.author: Tanares RPG 5e

description.p: Your grumpy nature and natural weariness caused by the tragic past of your people made you careful and dedicated in your work but also distant to most people. You receive a -1 penalty on all your Charisma checks, but gain a +1 bonus on all your Wisdom checks.
